fulltext:
Lu Khai Minh
FULL STACK / MEAN STACK/ PHP / TYPESCRIPT/ C#
Career Objective
To be able to work for an encouraging and stable company that will assist me in developing,
improving, and obtaining the necessary skills in order to become the best engineer possible.
Experience Record
CN SOLUTION
2019 - PRESENT
Technical Lead
Main responsibilities:
- Review and merge code of members.
- Build Front-end core (Angular 2+), API core (NodeJS, Typescript), Back-end C#, Ruby.
- Build Docker, Monitoring System with Prometheus & Grafana.
- Design, maintenance big database (SQL Server, MongoDB). 
- Setup, install softwares / services on Windows Server (RSA Netwitness, Symantec Control
Compliance Suite, Nexpose, RSA Archer, Cuckoo...).
Highlights projects: 
1/ Attack Map (Project Lead)
- Project Description: Listen and collect events from RSA Netwitness and show the attack map,
report, replay ...
- Language/Technical: HTML, CSS, JS, Nodejs, Angular, SQL Server, Docker, Prometheus, Grafana.
2/ Auto Email Alert (Project Lead)
- Project Description: Development Windows Service to scan Inbox of Mail Server, auto reply, analysis
attachments with Cuckoo and create incident reports in RSA Archer. More details as
link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b7iO7F_AVvw
- Language/Technical: C#, RSA Archer API, Cuckoo.
YOUNET MEDIA
2016 - 2019
Senior Full Stack
Main responsibilities:
- Review and merge code of members.
- Build Front-end core (Angular 2+), API core (Zend 3, PHP 7, Loopback 3, Featherjs 3).
- Build Docker, Monitoring System with Prometheus & Grafana.
- Design, maintenance big database (Apache Solr). 
- Support Crawler, System.
Highlights projects: 
1/ Socialheat (Project Lead)
- Project Description: Listen and collect millions of relevant conversations of consumers per day,
from all platforms such as Facebook (Vietnam: more than 1 million fanpages & groups, 100 millions
facebook profiles), Youtube (250,000 channels), Online News, Forums (3,000 channels), Blogs
(10,000) , Q&A sites, Review sites, Ecommerce sites etc. 
- Language/Technical: HTML, CSS, JS, PHP, Nodejs, Angular, MySql, Solr, Redis, Jenkins, Docker,
Prometheus, Grafana.
2/ Support Tool (Project Lead)
- Project Description: Younet Internal tool: support for over 200 salesmen/marketing guys in
company. Tool get instant data from online platform like: Facebook, Youtube, Instagram as well as
News/Forum sites. It also have feature to support for managing, analyzing, drawing chars and
exporting to excel, ...
- Language/Technical: Nodejs API (Loopback 3), Angular 4, MySql, Solr, Redis, RabbitMQ, Jenkins,
Docker, Facebook Graph Api, Youtube Api, ...
3/ Hosiana (Project Lead):
- Beta: https://new.hosiana.vn
- Project Description: Real Estate with Land & Home for Sale, Rent, Swap. Build Angular 6 core with
best practices(ngrx store/effects/entity/router-store, ..., universal/server-side rendering) for fork
May 13, 1989
 Male

090905 1459
 lukhaiminh@gmail.com

B406 Tan Tao Apartment, Lo Te
Street, Tan Tao A Ward, Binh
Tan District, HCMC

Skype ID: lukhaiminh
SKILLS
PHP/MYSQL/HTML/CSS/JS
NodeJs / Angular 2+
C# / SQL Server
Apache Solr
Redis/Memcached
MongoDB
System (Linux & Windows Server)
Java / Ruby
Game Programing(LUA/CocosJS)
INTERESTS
Soccer
Chinese chess
Math/Logic
Reading
2015 - 2016
Music
- Language/Technical: Typescript, Nodejs API (Loopback 3), Angular 6, MongoDB.
GNT (GIANTY)
Senior PHP Back-end
Main responsibilities:
- Build Back-end, API, CMS, KPI for mobile game.
- Build website.
Highlights projects: 
1/ MadZone
- Project Description: Mobile Game - Card Game, Global Public releasing. 
+ Become the Boss, recruit Gangsters, and lead your Gang to explore the now jaded World with real
locations. There's no shortage of content, action or ammunition as you fight along your fellow gang
... 
+ Communicating between Game Server and Clients using sockets, Using Bitwise Operation for
Securing up/down data, Speeding up with Mem-Cache and Crontab.
- Language/Technical: HTML, CSS, JS, PHP, MySql, Memcache, Third Party, …
2/ Nahi Payment: https://pay.nahi.vn (Project Lead)
- Project Description: Project description: An online payment website that support mobile card, VTC
card and Mega card (using epay service). We build the management system to create Nahi card, gift
card (one kind of internal card) and provide the ability to import/export card information, create
password for the Excel. There is a user management system to manage users and accounts so that
we can allow users to perform payment and also can block the account, …
- Language: HTML, CSS, JS, PHP, MySql.
BRAVESOFT CO. LTD
2014 - 2015
Senior Full Stack
Main responsibilities:
- Build Back-end moblie application, Mini web game.
- Build Server API for mobile application. 
Highlights projects: English Chat 
- ProjectDescription: Build Chat Application for learning Japannese and English on IOS, for interactive
teaching and learning on Mobile or PC. Using Apple Push (APNs) to send messages, queue.
- Language: HTML, CSS, JS, PHP (using framework CakePHP), MySql, Objective-C. 
TITAN JS CO. LTD
2013 - 2014
Web/Software Developer
Main responsibilities:
- Design, Program Web Projects base on PHP framework: Symfony, CakePHP., ...
- Build  software base on PHP, Java.
Highlights project: Tube System
- Project Description: Build and Deploy Website’s functions for Video such as: Rating, Voting,
Descriptions ... (using internal PHP framework). The system allows the administrators to create
categories/keywords and set schedules to automatically scrape/crawl videos from external
websites. Besides that, the system also provides the administrators some easy/dynamic ways to
crawl videos when the target URL of videos changed... 
-  Language/Technical: HTML, CSS, JS, PHP, MySql, Third Party, Redis Caching, Sphinx Search.
BT VIETNAM COMPANY
2011 - 2013
Web Developer/Servers maintainer
Main responsibilities:
- Design and develop Webs base on PHP/HTML/CSS/JavaScript, Optimize & SEO. 
- Maintain Servers.
Projects: https://vietbeauties.com.vn http://hkpackaging.com http://zell-v.com.vn
PRIVATE PROJECTS
...
-  Language/Technical: HTML, CSS, JS, PHP, MySql, Third Party, Redis Caching, Sphinx Search.
1/ Kiem The Private Game: Online Desktop Game (2012 - 2013)
- Develop, edit and build new features, tools for Games.
- Manage and Configure Servers are based on Windows Server 2003 and 2008. Also maintain
database of Games, Websites and Forums.
- Design and Program Websites, Forum.
- Payment via KetNoi Pay (Hanoi).
- Language/Technical: HTML, CSS, JS, PHP, MySql, Vbulletin, , LUA, Third Party.
2/ Website
https://hosiana.vn (2018 - Angular 6, Nodejs Loopback 3 / Typescript, MongoDB).
https://shigotojp.com (2019 - Angular 6, Nodejs Nestjs, MongoDB).
https://bizlike.vn (2019 - Angular 6, Nodejs Nestjs, MongoDB).
http://minhluanhotel.com (2018 - Wordpress).
http://hoidongmtgquinhon.com (2018 - Wordpress).
VAN LANG UNIVERSITY
2007 - 2011
 Education
Major: Software Engineering
Work Experience
- Solid web & mobile development experience using OOP, PHP, NodeJS, AJAX, MySQL, MongoDB ,
Solr, JavaScript, Typescript, JSON, XML, HTML, CSS, REST API, ...
- Experience working with: Docker, Gitlab, Amazon Web Services, Google Web Services, Apple Push
Notification, Payment Gateway, ChatWork, Backlog, Jira, Bitrix…
- Experience using framework: Zend 1/2/3, Cake 2/3, Loopback 3, FeatherJs 3, NestJs, Angular
4,5,6,7; Service: Memcache, Redis; CMS: Wordpress, Joomla, Vbulletin, IPB, phpBB.
- Operating Systems: Linux (CentOS and Ubuntu), Windows.
- Tools: VS Code, Visual Studio, SVN, Git, Navicat, SQLYog, SourceTree, XDebug, …
- Setup, deploy, maintain Linux & Windows server, web service.
- Read and Understand English Documents, analysis skill, finding solution to resolve problem, self-
study skill, independent work and team work.
© topcv.vn
